title: Jax VU
body:
So, when can we expect Jax to get a proper Visual Update? He doesn't look as bad as he used to, his textures look better, but his model and animations are still clunky and awkward.

rito pls

replies.body:
There are like 10 champs that are worse off than Jax atm.

This is the official list of who has updates coming - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884

Oh sweet, gangplank's getting a visual and gameplay update.

Maybe dat Q will become a shillshot?
